prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon that resembles a giant whale with playful features and a bright smile.
I want a large aquatic creature with a round body and a friendly demeanor, perfect for ocean adventures.
Generate a Pokemon that has a blue color scheme and loves to swim in the sea, showing joyful expressions.
Make a cheerful and round Pokemon that has a cute face and enjoys playing in the waves.
Imagine a large, blubbery Pokemon that can float on water, with big eyes and a playful personality.
Design a blue whale-like Pokemon with a white underbelly and a playful attitude towards trainers.
Show me a fun and friendly water-type Pokemon that loves splashing around and making friends.
